title: MDN
description: Web development documentation, articles, tutorials, and other media.

title: Monkeytype
description: A typing practice app with plenty of features. Free and open source.

title: I Build It
description: Reasonably-priced plans, focused on jigs, tools, and shop utilities.

title: The Wood Database
description: All the information you could reasonably need regarding hundreds of species of wood.

title: Myrient
description: A repository dedicated to archiving retro and modern game ROMs.

title: Public-APIs
description: A comprehensive list of public APIs across a wide range of categories.

title: Tech Icons
description: Free SVG icons for almost any popular library, framework, or software you can think of.

title: Toptal Designers HTML Reference
description: An easy-to-use reference for HTML symbol codes.

title: HTML Color Codes
description: A list of every HTML color name, along with its hex and rgb codes.
